snippet: The central bank said it expected a slower increase in interest rates. Officials also cut their forecast for growth this year, to between 1.8 and 2 percent.
abstract: Stocks rise after Federal Reserve says it is in no hurry to raise interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The central bank said it expected a slower increase in interest rates. Officials also cut their forecast for growth this year, to between 1.8 and 2 percent.

headline.main: Modest Gain for Market After Statement by the Fed.
headline.print_headline: Fed’s Steady Hand Leads to Gain in the Market
